| History                 = The Kamekeri were people from the Incan tribes{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Costa Verde]]'s entry}} who lived in modern-days [[Costa Verde]], and worshiped the [[Apu|Gods]] [[Inti (Earth-616)|Inti]], [[Kuat (Earth-616)|Kuat]], [[Con Ticci Viracocha (Earth-616)|Viracocha]], [[Manco Capac (Earth-616)|Manco Capac]], [[Aiomum Kondi (Earth-616)|Aiomum Kondi]], [[Coniraya (Earth-616)|Coniraya]], [[Guecufu (Earth-616)|Guecufu]], [[Kanassa (Earth-616)|Kanassa]], [[Okonorote (Earth-616)|Okonorote]], [[Kulamina (Earth-616|Kulamina]] and [[Peliali (Earth-616)|Peliali, the Volcano Goddess]], among many others. The gods were omnipresent in the Kamekeri's daily lives, governing from plantings and harvests to the rule of law.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 28}}

When the missionaries came, they converted the natives to [[Christianity]], and apart from Peliali who remained with the Kamekeri, all the gods departed.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 28}}

...{{r|Avengers Vol 3 28}}
